job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Collaborate closely with our developers to integrate code into the shared repository.
     * Streamline, automate and manage our infrastructure and application deployment processes.
     * Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of our AI applications.
     * Maintain and enhance CI/CD pipelines.
     * Monitor infrastructure , ensure high availability, and proactively address any issues.
job_details.full_text:
DevOps Engineer

* Collaborate closely with our developers to integrate code into the shared repository.
     * Streamline, automate and manage our infrastructure and application deployment processes.
     * Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of our AI applications.
     * Maintain and enhance CI/CD pipelines.
     * Monitor infrastructure , ensure high availability, and proactively address any issues.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional DevOps tasks like CI/CD, infrastructure management, and deployment automation. While it mentions AI applications, it lacks specific details on model development, fine-tuning, or generative AI techniques, making it lean towards a general DevOps role rather than a specialized AI engineering profile.

phrases: Collaborate closely with our developers to integrate code into the shared repository.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the collaborative software development process, a core aspect of integrating AI features into applications.

phrases: Streamline, automate and manage our infrastructure and application deployment processes.
Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of our AI applications.
Monitor infrastructure , ensure high availability, and proactively address any issues.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining systems, including infrastructure, deployment processes, CI/CD, monitoring, and ensuring performance and security, which are key components of MLOps when applied to AI systems.

phrases: Streamline, automate and manage our infrastructure and application deployment processes.
Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of our AI applications.
Monitor infrastructure , ensure high availability, and proactively address any issues.
soft_skills.justification: These phrases imply a need to solve complex infrastructure and deployment challenges, focusing on efficiency, reliability, and performance.

phrases: Collaborate closely with our developers to integrate code into the shared repository.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with developers, a key aspect of inter-team communication.

phrases: Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of our AI applications.
Monitor infrastructure , ensure high availability, and proactively address any issues.
soft_skills.justification: The dynamic nature of AI applications and infrastructure requires continuous learning and adaptation to maintain optimal performance and security.
